title: Enter your competitors
points: Specify up to 5 any domains, subdomains, folders or exact URLs. Get a list containing all common and unique keywords they rank for.

title: Choose keyword types
points: Switch between the keywords for organic, paid search, and PLA. Mix the types, see how they intersect, and assess your SEO and PPC efforts.

title: Get insights to stay ahead
points: Find out the competitors with the largest keyword profile. Create your own keyword masterlist helping you beat your competitors.

title: CTA
points: Get 7-day unlimited access to all Semrush tools and reports
